question: 洗車
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>wash</kanji> that washes <kanji>car</kanji>s is a <vocabulary>car wash</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Don't confuse this with the same-sounding <ja>戦車</ja> though... unless you're washing your <ja>戦車</ja> in a <ja>洗車</ja>...
